short_summary: Vessel Charter services for Fisheries Compliance
description: Fishery Officers monitoring compliance in Eastern New Brunswick waters
full_summary:
# Passenger Vessel Charter Contract
## Request for Proposal (RFP) Notice

### Notice Details

| Field          | Value                                                               |
|----------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------|
| Reference Number | CB-6870-11496243                                                    |
| Solicitation Number | 30004463                                                        |
| Tender Closing Date | Tuesday, July 18, 2023 @ 13:00:00 ET                               |
| Expected Contract Start Date | Wednesday, July 26, 2023                                          |
| Expected Contract End Date | Tuesday, November 15, 2023                                        |

### Proposal Requirements

The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) is seeking Vessel Charter services to serve as a platform for Fishery Officers to monitor compliance in various fisheries. The proposed vessel will be required to operate in the waters surrounding the Eastern shore of New Brunswick, and will be subject to "as requested" services.

### Key Requirements

* The successful proponent must have a valid commercial transportation certificate issued by the Transportation Safety Board of Canada.
* The proposed vessel must meet or exceed the standards set out in the current edition of the Harmonized System of Maritime Vessel Inspections.
* The proponent must be familiar with the requirements and regulations set out in the Canadian Navigation Safety Regulations, 1995.

### Evaluation Criteria

One or more proponents will be selected for award based on the following evaluation criteria:

* The lowest price submitted by a Proponent
* The experience and qualifications of the Proponent
* The ability of the Proponent to supply the Services described in the proposal

### How to Participate

Bidders interested in participating in this RFP can obtain the tender document by visiting the Canada Buys website at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). 

Tender inquiries can be directed to the Fisheries and Oceans Canada Procurement Service Centre at [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or by calling (506) 478-3581. 

EOI applications will be accepted until the closing date and time specified above. Late applications will not be accepted. 

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: Tuesday, July 18, 2023 @ 13:00:00 ET
* Expected Contract Start Date: Wednesday, July 26, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: Tuesday, November 15
